meta.job_title: Level III Pressure Relief Valve Technician

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform complete over-haul and testing of all manufacturers’ pressure relief valves.
Execute trouble-shooting and testing in shop and field environments.
Work autonomously in valve repair process.
Ensure all testing and repair reports are in compliance with quality system and National Board Inspection Code criteria.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED equivalent is preferred. Minimum 3-5 years of experience in Pressure Relief Valve repair. Pressure Relief Valve Manufacturers Training Courses and/or certifications are preferred. Knowledge of Trevitest, EVT, AVK, or other in-line test equipment is preferred. Solid working knowledge of the ASME and NBIC codes is required.
